Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
Direct Known Subclasses:
SoloGame
public class Game
extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game()
      Constructor of the Game class. It instantiates the Market, the LeaderDeck and the DevelopDecks for the current game.

  • Method Details

    • setListener

      public void setListener​(SourceListener view)
      Simple method used to set the view as listener of the model
      Parameters:
      view - the view object that implements PropertyChangeListener

    • getPhase

      public GamePhase getPhase()
      Simple method that returns the current GamePhase.
      Returns:
      the current GamePhase

    • getPlayers

      public java.util.ArrayList<Player> getPlayers()
      This method returns the players in the current game.
      Returns:
      the list of Player

    • getActivePlayers

      public java.util.ArrayList<Player> getActivePlayers()
      This method returns the active players in the current game.
      Returns:
      the list of ActivePlayer

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public Player getCurrentPlayer()
      This method returns the current player.
      Returns:
      the currentPlayer

    • isDoneMandatory

      public boolean isDoneMandatory()
      This method returns if the mandatory action has been done
      Returns:
      true if the Mandatory Action has already been done

    • parseColor

      protected Color parseColor​(int col)
      Simple utility method used in Game's contructor to instantiate the DevelopDeck of a certain color
      Parameters:
      col - is the index of the column correspondent to a color
      Returns:
      the color correspondent to col

    • start

      public void start()
      This method is called by the controller when the last player is connected to the game. It shuffles the list of activePlayers to select the first one. Then gives the leaders to each player (4 cards, in which 2 to be chosen) and the initial resources and faith to each player if they have to.

    • notifyInitialState

      private void notifyInitialState()
      Utility method used to notify the view of the initial state of the market and of the developDecks

    • notifyLeaders

      private void notifyLeaders​(java.lang.String action)
      Utility method used to notify the view that the currentPlayer needs to choose his leaders or to notify him of the correct selection of the leaders
      Parameters:
      action - the action that is to be sent to the player (choose leader: the player needs to choose his leaders, the id of the leaders between the player needs to choose are sent; ok leaders: the selection of the leaders is correct and the id of the selected leaders are sent)

    • createPlayer

      public void createPlayer​(java.lang.String name)
      This method is used when a player joins the game
      Parameters:
      name - is the Player's name

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer​(java.lang.String name)
      This method is used when a player leaves the game (when the match has not started yet)
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the disconnected player

    • produce

      public void produce​(java.lang.String player, Message info) throws InvalidActionException
      This method is called by the controller when a client decided to activate productions. It checks if the player who wants to do the action is the current one (if it is his turn), then calls the player's produce method.
      Parameters:
      player - is the player who wants to do the action
      info - this map contains the info about all the productions that the player wants to activate
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - when it is not the turn of the player who wants to act, when he already did a mandatory action or when the one of the productions was invalid (no resources or wrong positions from where to take them)

    • notifyProduce

      private void notifyProduce()
      Utility method used to notify the view of the corrected execution of a produce action. It sends to the view the new situation of the deposits and strongbox of the player that did the action

    • activateLeader

      public void activateLeader​(java.lang.String player, int pos) throws InvalidActionException
      This method is called by the controller when a client decided to activate a leader. It checks if the player who wants to do the action is the current one (if it is his turn), then calls the player's activateLeader method.
      Parameters:
      player - is the player who wants to do the action
      pos - it represents the leader that the player wants to activate
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - when it is not the turn of the player, when he already activated/discarded his leaders, when he doesn't respect the requirements of the selected leader.

    • notifyLeaderAction

      private void notifyLeaderAction​(java.lang.String action, int pos)
      Utility method used to notify the view of a corrected execution of a leader action (activate/discard). it sends to the view the index of the activated/discarded leader, the action performed and the new position of the player (if the leader has been discarded)
      Parameters:
      action - the action performed
      pos - it represents the leader that the player has activated/discarded

    • discardLeader

      public void discardLeader​(java.lang.String player, int pos) throws InvalidActionException
      This method is called by the controller when a client decided to discard a leader. It checks if the player who wants to do the action is the current one (if it is his turn), then calls the player's discardLeader method.
      Parameters:
      player - is the player who wants to do the action
      pos - it represents the leader that the player wants to discard
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - when it is not the turn of the player, when he already activated/discarded his leaders.

    • endTurn

      public void endTurn​(java.lang.String player) throws InvalidActionException
      This method is called by the controller when a client decided to end his turn. It checks if the player who wants to do the action is the current one (if it is his turn), then it activates the Pope's reports if needed (setting or discarding the FavorTiles of each player) and controls if the game is at the end: if so, it counts the points of each player and selects the winner; otherwise, it chooses the next player that can do actions (currentPlayer).
      Parameters:
      player - is the player who wants to end the turn
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - when it is not the turn of the player

    • notifyEndTurn

      private void notifyEndTurn​(java.lang.String ended)
      Utility method used to notify the corrected execution of the end turn action. It sends to the view the new situation of the player's FavorTile. This method is called once for each player connected to the game
      Parameters:
      ended - the player that ended the turn

    • notifyEndGame

      private void notifyEndGame​(java.lang.String player, java.lang.String winner, int points, int winnerpoints)
      This method is called once for each player of the game. It sends to the view the name of the winner and the amount of points scored by the addressee player
      Parameters:
      player - the name of the addressee player
      winner - the name of the winner
      points - the points scored by the addressee

    • setTiles

      private void setTiles​(Player max, int pos)
      Utility method used when a player reaches a pope's space on the FaithTrack. It checks the other players' positions and activate/discard their FavorTile depending on their position.
      Parameters:
      max - it is the player that triggered the action: his FavorTile has already been set in endTurn()
      pos - it indicates which of the 3 FavorTiles needs to be activated or discarded for each player

    • getPoints

      protected int getPoints​(Player player)
      Utility method used to count the victory points cumulated by a player.
      Parameters:
      player - the player whose points are going to be calculated
      Returns:
      the number of points of the player passed as a parameter

    • winnerByResources

      private Player winnerByResources​(Player p1, Player p2)
      Utility method called when two players have the same amount of victory points. It chooses the winner based on the amount of resources left for each player.
      Parameters:
      p1 - the first player
      p2 - th second player
      Returns:
      the winner (the player that has more resources)

    • chooseInitialResource

      public void chooseInitialResource​(java.lang.String player, Message map) throws InvalidActionException
      This method is used for a chooseInitialResource move at the start of the game.
      Parameters:
      player - is the player's name.
      map - is where the information is stored.
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - is the move is not valid.

    • chooseLeaders

      public void chooseLeaders​(java.lang.String player, Message map) throws InvalidActionException
      This method is called when a player chooses his leaders.
      Parameters:
      player - the player who wants to do the action
      map - this map contains the indexes of the two leaders chosen
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - when one or both indexes are missing or if it is not the turn of the player.

    • notifyResources

      private void notifyResources​(java.lang.String action)
      Utility method used to notify the view that the player needs to choose the type and position of the initial resources or that the action is completed
      Parameters:
      action - the action that is to be sent to the view (chooseResources or okResources)

    • notifyTurn

      private void notifyTurn()
      Utility method used to notify the view that is the turn of the currentPlayer

    • buy

      public void buy​(java.lang.String player, Message map) throws InvalidActionException, java.lang.NumberFormatException
      This method is used for a buy move during the turn.
      Parameters:
      player - is the player's name.
      map - is where the information is stored.
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the move is not valid.
      java.lang.NumberFormatException - if the format is not valid.

    • notifyBuy

      private void notifyBuy​(int slot, int bought, int col, int row)
      Utility method used to notify the view that the buy action went fine. It sends to the client the new situation of deposits and strongbox, the id of the new top card for the deck from where he bought the card, and the id of the bought card
      Parameters:
      slot - the index of the slot where the player put the bought card
      bought - the id of the bought card
      col - the col of the deck where the player bought the card
      row - the row of the deck where the player bought the card

    • swapDeposit

      public void swapDeposit​(java.lang.String player, Message map) throws InvalidActionException
      This method is used for a swapDeposit move during the turn.
      Parameters:
      player - is the player's name.
      map - is where the information is stored.
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the move is not valid.

    • notifySwap

      private void notifySwap()
      Utility method used to notify the view that the swap action went fine. It sends to the client the new situation of the deposits and strongbox

    • fromMarket

      public void fromMarket​(java.lang.String player, Message map) throws InvalidActionException
      This method is used for taking resources from the Market
      Parameters:
      player - is the Player's name
      map - is the map with the information
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the move is not valid

    • notifyMarket

      private void notifyMarket​(java.lang.String chosen, int value, int discarded)
      Utility method used to notify the view that a fromMarket action went fine. It sends to the client the new situation of the deposits and strongbox, the new situation of the market and (to the other clients) the amount to add to their position and (only to the client that did the action) his new position
      Parameters:
      chosen - row or col of the market chosen by the player
      value - the index of the row or col
      discarded - the amount of resources discarded by the player

    • setPhase

      public void setPhase​(GamePhase gamePhase)
      Just for testing
      Parameters:
      gamePhase - the phase
